nl.inl.blacklab.index

Class DocIndexerXmlHandlers

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexer
      • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerAbstract
        • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerXmlHandlers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocIndexerAlto, DocIndexerExample, DocIndexerFolia, DocIndexerOpenSonar, DocIndexerPageXml, DocIndexerTeiBase, DocIndexerWhiteLab2, DocIndexerXmlSketch

    public abstract class DocIndexerXmlHandlers
extends DocIndexerAbstract
    Abstract base class for a DocIndexer processing XML files using the hookable SAX parser.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.DefaultWordHandler
      Handle <Word> tags (word tokens).
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.DocumentElementHandler
      Handle Document element.
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.InlineTagHandler
      Handle tags.
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataAttributesHandler
      Add element attributes as metadata.
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataElementHandler
      Stores metadata field with element name as name and element content as value.
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataNameValueAttributeHandler
      Add a metadatafield based on two attributes of an element, a name attribute (giving the field name) and a value attribute (giving the field value).
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.WordHandlerBase
      Base handler for word tags: adds start and end positions around the element.
      class  DocIndexerXmlHandlers.WordInAttributeHandler
      Handle <Word> tags (word tokens).
